name: @RenamePanga
author: AFNI Developers
description: Creates AFNI bricks from RealTime GE EPI series.

inputs.description: The directory number where the first image of the series is stored
inputs.name: Directory Number

inputs.description: The number of the first image in the series
inputs.name: First Image Number

inputs.description: The number of slices making up the imaged volume
inputs.name: Number of Slices

inputs.description: The number of samples in your time series
inputs.name: Number of Reps

inputs.description: The prefix for the output brick
inputs.name: Output Root

inputs.description: Forces @RenamePanga to use the prefix you designate without modification
inputs.name: Keep Prefix Flag

inputs.description: Launches to3d in interactive mode. This allows you to double check the automated settings.
inputs.name: Interactive Flag

inputs.description: Performs outliers check and writes the outliers to a .1D file placed in the output directory
inputs.name: Outliers Check Flag

inputs.description: Sets the slice acquisition pattern. The default option is alt+z.
inputs.name: Slice Pattern

inputs.description: Directory where the output (bricks and 1D files) will be stored. The default directory is ./afni
inputs.name: Output Directory

output-files.description: Log file created in the current directory
output-files.name: Log File
